basics.name: Emma Stebbins
basics.label: Full-stack software engineer experienced with C#, Python, JavaScript.
basics.summary:
Full-stack software engineer experienced with C#, Python, JavaScript. 6 years of full-time professional software engineering with additional years of internships while at the University of Washington.

I have worked on recurring billing, e-commerce, user authentication, insurance claims, and in public research at the University of Washington. 

Happily trans (she/her)!

work.name: Humble Bundle
work.summary:
* Planned a comprehensive internationalization project for a minimally internationalized web application
* Worked with product to define a plan to optimize the user funnel for our monthly product
* Integrated an OAuth login system for Facebook and Google into our existing user system
* Planned a project to migrate all sessions to the newly required email or TOTP two-factor system
* Helped define standards for representing DateTimes, Money, and Percents in Python and JavaScript

work.name: Committee for Children
work.summary:
» Lead replacement of a legacy monolithic DNN platform over to using React and .NET Core
» Migrated user authentication to an OpenID identity provider(IdentityServer4)
» Incrementally rewrote a series of untested stored procedures into a modern C# WebAPI.

work.name: Trov Inc.
